alert.note: Alert for Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 11 at 12:54PM CST until December 13 at 3:48AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Cibolo Creek Near Falls City affecting Karnes County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cibolo Creek Near Falls City. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding of crop and pastureland damages irrigation pumps and any equipment near the channel. Livestock are cut off in low areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 0.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 18.0 feet late tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 17.6 feet on 05/16/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Cibolo Creek Falls City 17.0 0.8 Sun 12 pm CS 17.9 1.4 1.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM CST.
